name: icecast-metadata-stats
description: Simple to use Javascript class that queries an Icecast compatible server for metadata and statistics

scripts.update-version: find ../demo -iname 'icecast-metadata-stats*' -exec rm "{}" \; && find ./ ../demo -name '.map' -prune -o -name '.git' -prune -o -name 'node_modules' -prune -o -name 'build' -prune -o -name 'package*' -prune -o -type f -printf '\n%p:' -exec sed -i "s/icecast-metadata-stats-[0-9].[0-9].[0-9]/icecast-metadata-stats-$npm_package_version/g w /dev/fd/2" "{}" \; && cp ./build/*.js ./build/*.map ../demo/public/
